definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :1Sa 13:23 standing-place, station, garrison;—´[[מ]] abs. 1Sa 14:15, cstr. [[מַצַּב]] Jos 4:3, Jos 4:9 + (Baer in Sm [[מַצָּב]], cf. on 1Sa 13:23, but v. Ginsb); sf. [[מַצָּבְֶ֫]] Is 22:19; —
garrison, post, or outpost (of Philistines) 1Sa 13:23, 1Sa 14:1, 1Sa 14:4, 1Sa 14:6, 1Sa 14:11, 1Sa 14:15, 2Sa 23:14; so rd. also 1Sa 14:12 (for MT [[מַצָּבָה]]) LXX Th We Bu HPS.
